description: Hlavni soubor README.md obsahuje nevyresene konflikty git merge (znacky <<<<<<< HEAD na radcich 3 a 168). To zpusobuje, ze vstupni bod projektu je pro nove vyvojare matouci a brani spravnemu vykresleni dokumentace na GitHubu.

phases.name: Verification & Resolution
phases.description: Verify the state of README.md, resolve any merge conflicts, and ensure proper documentation

subtasks.title: Scan README.md for merge conflict markers
subtasks.description: Search for <<<<<<< HEAD, =======, and >>>>>>> markers in README.md to identify any unresolved merge conflicts at lines 3 and 168 as specified in the issue
acceptance_criteria: Search completed for all merge conflict patterns
Document whether conflicts exist or have been resolved
subtasks.notes: Verified no merge conflict markers exist in README.md. Searched for <<<<<<< HEAD, =======, and >>>>>>> patterns - all returned no matches. Lines 3 and 168 contain clean content. The merge conflicts have already been resolved in a previous session.

subtasks.title: Resolve merge conflicts if present
subtasks.description: If merge conflict markers are found, analyze both versions and choose the correct content. Remove conflict markers and preserve the intended documentation
acceptance_criteria: Content reflects the intended final version
subtasks.notes: No merge conflict markers found in README.md. Verified by searching for <<<<<<< HEAD, =======, and >>>>>>> patterns - all returned no matches. The merge conflicts reported at lines 3 and 168 have already been resolved in a previous session. README.md contains clean, properly formatted content with no conflict markers to remove.

subtasks.title: Validate README.md renders correctly
subtasks.description: Verify that README.md is valid markdown, has proper structure, and will render correctly on GitHub
subtasks.notes: Verification completed successfully. README.md is valid markdown with: (1) No merge conflict markers found, (2) Proper heading hierarchy with 1 title, 12 main sections, 20+ subsections, (3) All 10 code blocks properly opened/closed with appropriate language identifiers (bash, env, sql, css), (4) All 14 links using correct [text](url) format, (5) Proper use of bold text, blockquotes, and lists. The file will render correctly on GitHub.

subtasks.title: Commit and document resolution
subtasks.description: Create a git commit documenting the merge conflict resolution and update build-progress.txt
acceptance_criteria: Git commit created with descriptive message
subtasks.notes: Completed documentation and commit. Updated build-progress.txt with comprehensive resolution notes. All merge conflict verification work has been properly documented. Final commit created to document the resolution.

final_acceptance: README.md contains no merge conflict markers

qa_signoff.tests_passed: All verification checks passed: No merge conflict markers in README.md, valid markdown structure verified, all links and code blocks properly formatted

recoveryNote: Task recovered from stuck state at 2025-12-25T15:24:02.252Z
